validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
validation.between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
validation.between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
validation.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
validation.gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
validation.gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.
validation.gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.
validation.gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value.
validation.gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value kilobytes.
validation.gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value characters.
validation.gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.
validation.in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
validation.lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
validation.lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.
validation.lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.
validation.lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value.
validation.lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value kilobytes.
validation.lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value characters.
validation.lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.
validation.max.numeric: The :attribute may not be greater than :max.
validation.max.file: The :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation.max.string: The :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.
validation.max.array: The :attribute may not have more than :max items.
validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
validation.min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
validation.min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
validation.starts_with: The :attribute must start with one of the following: :values
validation.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid zone.
validation.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
If you forgot your password, well, then: If you forgot your password, well, then we'll email you instructions to reset your password.

Notify me by email about resumption of s: Notify me by email about resumption of sales

Password should be a minimum of 6 digits: Password should be a minimum of 6 digits and include lower and uppercase letter.
Here is your recent activities. You can: Here is your recent activities. You can clear this log as well as disable the feature from profile settings tabs.
To comply with regulations each particip: To comply with regulations each participant is required to go through identity verification (KYC/AML) to prevent fraud, money laundering operations, transactions banned under the sanctions regime or those which fund terrorism. Please, complete our fast and secure verification process to participate in token offerings.
To comply with regulation, participant w: To comply with regulation, participant will have to go through identity verification.
You have not submitted your necessary do: You have not submitted your necessary documents to verify your identity.
It would great if you please submit the: It would great if you please submit the form. If you have any question, please feel free to contact our support team.
Click here to complete your KYC: Click here to complete your KYC
You have completed the process of KYC: You have completed the process of KYC
We are still waiting for your identity v: We are still waiting for your identity verification. Once our team verified your identity, you will be notified by email. You can also check your KYC compliance status from your profile page.
We are still working on your identity ve: We are still working on your identity verification. Once our team verified your identity, you will be notified by email.
In our verification process, we found in: In our verification process, we found information that is incorrect or missing. Please resubmit the form. In case of any issues with the submission please contact our support team.
One of our team members verified your id: One of our team members verified your identity. Now you can participate in our token sale. Thank you.
We found some information to be missing.
In order to purchase our tokens, please: In order to purchase our tokens, please verify your identity.
Verify your identity to participate in t: Verify your identity to participate in token sale.
You have not submitted your documents to: You have not submitted your documents to verify your identity (KYC).
We will review your information and if a: We will review your information and if all is in order will approve your identity. You will be notified by email once we verified your identity (KYC).
We were having difficulties verifying yo: We were having difficulties verifying your identity. In our verification process, we found information are incorrect or missing. Please re-submit the application again and verify your identity.
One for our team verified your identity. You are eligible to participate in our token sale.
KYC verification required for purchase t: KYC verification required for purchase token
Your basic personal information is requi: Your basic personal information is required for identification purposes.
Please type carefully and fill out the f: Please type carefully and fill out the form with your personal details. You are not allowed to edit the details once you have submitted the application.
To verify your identity, we ask you to u: To verify your identity, we ask you to upload high-quality scans or photos of your official identification documents issued by the government.
In order to complete, please upload any: In order to complete, please upload any of the following personal documents.
To avoid delays with verification proces: To avoid delays with verification process, please double-check to ensure the below requirements are fully met:
Document should be in good condition and: Document should be in good condition and clearly visible.
There is no light glare or reflections o: There is no light glare or reflections on the card.
Chosen credential must not be expired.
File is at least 1 MB in size and has at: File is at least 1 MB in size and has at least 300 dpi resolution.
Upload Here Your National ID Back Side: Upload Here Your National ID Back Side
Upload a selfie as a Photo Proof while h: Upload a selfie as a Photo Proof while holding document in your hand
Submit your wallet address that you are: Submit your wallet address that you are going to send funds
DO NOT USE your exchange wallet address: DO NOT USE your exchange wallet address such as Kraken, Bitfinex, Bithumb, Binance etc.
All the personal information I have ente: All the personal information I have entered is correct.
I certify that, I am registering to part: I certify that, I am registering to participate in the token distribution event(s) in the capacity of an individual (and beneficial owner) and not as an agent or representative of a third party corporate entity.
I understand that, I can participate in: I understand that, I can participate in the token distribution event(s) only with the wallet address that was entered in the application form.
You should read our terms and policy.
Confirm that all information is correct.
Our sale will start soon. Please check b: Our sale will start soon. Please check back at a later date/time or feel free to contact us.
Choose currency and calculate :SYMBOL to: Choose currency and calculate :SYMBOL token price
You can buy our :SYMBOL token using the: You can buy our :SYMBOL token using the below currency choices to become part of our project.
Enter the amount you would like to contr: Enter the amount you would like to contribute in order to calculate the amount of tokens you will receive. The calculator below helps to convert the required quantity of tokens into the amount of your selected currency.
Your contribution will be calculated bas: Your contribution will be calculated based on exchange rate at the moment when your transaction is confirmed.
Tokens will appear in your account after: Tokens will appear in your account after payment successfully made and approved by our team. Please note that, :SYMBOL token will be distributed after the token sales end-date.
You can choose any of following payment: You can choose any of following payment method to make your payment. The tokens balance will appear in your account after successful payment.
Our payment address will appear or redir: Our payment address will appear or redirect you for payment after your order placed.
Payment gateway may charge you a process: Payment gateway may charge you a processing fees.
You have canceled your payment. If you c: You have canceled your payment. If you continue to have issues, please contact us with order no. :orderid.
Your Order no. :orderid has been placed: Your Order no. :orderid has been placed successfully.
Your Order no. :orderid has been placed & waiting for payment.
Your Order no. :orderid has been placed & waiting for team approval.
Please send :amount :currency to the add: Please send :amount :currency to the address below. The token balance will appear in your account only after transaction gets :num confirmation and approved by our team.
To receiving :token :symbol token, pleas: To receiving :token :symbol token, please send :amount :currency to the address below. The token balance will appear in your account only after transaction gets :num confirmation and approved by our team.
Please make your payment of :amount :cur: Please make your payment of :amount :currency through bank to the below bank address. The token balance will appear in your account only after your transaction gets approved by our team.
To receiving :token :symbol token, pleas: To receiving :token :symbol token, please make your payment of :amount :currency through bank to the below bank address. The token balance will appear in your account only after your transaction gets approved by our team.
The token balance will appear in your ac: The token balance will appear in your account only after you transaction gets :num confirmations and approved by :gateway.
To receiving :token :symbol token, pleas: To receiving :token :symbol token, please make your payment of :amount :currency through :gateway. The token balance will appear in your account after we received your payment.
To speed up verification process please: To speed up verification process please enter your wallet address from where you'll transferring your amount to our address.
To speed up verification process, please: To speed up verification process, please enter your transaction hash or payment id.
Do not make payment through exchange (Kr: Do not make payment through exchange (Kraken, Bitfinex). You can use MyEtherWallet, MetaMask, Mist wallets etc.
In case you send a different amount, num: In case you send a different amount, number of :SYMBOL token will update accordingly.
Our payment address will appear or redir: Our payment address will appear or redirect you for payment after the order is placed.
Please make payment of :amount to receiv: Please make payment of :amount to receive :token_amount token including bonus :token_bonus token.
Please make payment of :amount to receive :token_amount token.
Payment to the following :Name Wallet Ad: Payment to the following :Name Wallet Address
Payment to the following :Name Wallet Address Or scan the QR code
I hereby agree to the token purchase agr: I hereby agree to the token purchase agreement and token sale term.
Sorry! There is no payment method availa: Sorry! There is no payment method available for this currency. Please choose another currency or contact our support team.
We'll review your transaction and get ba: We'll review your transaction and get back to your within 6 hours. You'll receive an email with the details of your contribution.
Click here if you already paid: Click here if you already paid
Make your payment to the below address: Make your payment to the below address
Please send :amount :currency to the add: Please send :amount :currency to the address below.
Click the Pay button below to make payme: Click the Pay button below to make payment for this transaction, or you can cancel this transaction.
The token balance will appear in your ac: The token balance will appear in your account only after your transaction gets approved by our team.
Make Payment to the Following Bank Accou: Make Payment to the Following Bank Account
Use this transaction id (#:orderid) as r: Use this transaction id (#:orderid) as reference. Make your payment within 24 hours, If we will not received your payment within 24 hours, then we will cancel the transaction.
The order no. :orderid was placed on :da: The order no. :orderid was placed on :datetime.
You have successfully paid this transact: You have successfully paid this transaction
Sorry! Your order has been :status due t: Sorry! Your order has been :status due to payment.
The transfer request was canceled at :ti: The transfer request was canceled at :time.
The transaction is currently under revie: The transaction is currently under review. We will send you an email once our review is complete.
The transaction was canceled by Administ: The transaction was canceled by Administrator at :time.
Sorry, seems there is an issues occurred: Sorry, seems there is an issues occurred and we couldn’t process your request. Please contact us with your order no. :orderid, if you continue to having the issues.
DO NOT USE your exchange wallet address: DO NOT USE your exchange wallet address OR if you don't have a private key of the your address. You WILL NOT receive your token and WILL LOSE YOUR FUNDS if you do.
In order to receive your :SYMBOL token,: In order to receive your :SYMBOL token, please select your wallet address and you have to put the address below input box. You will receive :SYMBOL token to this address after the token sale end.
Two-factor authentication is a method fo: Two-factor authentication is a method for protection of your account. When it is activated you are required to enter not only your password, but also a special code. You can receive this code in mobile app. Even if third party gets access to your password, they still won't be able to access your account without the 2FA code.
If you lost your phone or uninstall the: If you lost your phone or uninstall the Google Authenticator app, then you will lost access of your account.
Scan the below QR code by your Google Au: Scan the below QR code by your Google Authenticator app, or you can add account manually.
Enter the verification code generated by: Enter the verification code generated by your mobile application (Google Authenticator).
If you lost your phone or Uninstall the: If you lost your phone or Uninstall the Google Authenticator app and enable to access your account please contact with us.
Please enter your account password to re: Please enter your account password to reset 2FA authentication.
You have provide a invalid 2FA authentic: You have provide a invalid 2FA authentication code!
Please enter a valid authentication code: Please enter a valid authentication code!
Successfully enable 2FA security in your: Successfully enable 2FA security in your account.
Successfully disable 2FA security in you: Successfully disable 2FA security in your account.
